featured.text: My grandfather has astonishing powers of .
A triumph for medical technology, Oddsson’s fish skin transplantation was actually part of the astonishing achievement of “100% Fish,” an ambitious task in promoting environmental efficiency.

definition.zh_def: 令人驚訝的，令人震驚的
definition.en_def: Causing great surprise or wonder; amazing.
definition.example: The magician's performance was astonishing and left the audience in awe.
